msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: trawick
msg: Error codes from getaddrinfo() need their own range within the
apr_status_t layout.  This is used to fix the bungling of these

author: wrowe
msg: Split all win32 specific system calls from filepath.c into filesys.c
I don't care whether filepath.c remains in file_io/win32 or moves to
file_io/os2.  This is now generic enough for both ports to build upon.

author: trawick
msg: on some Unix boxes (e.g., Tru64), a non-blocking fcntl() lock request
returns EACCES instead of the usual EAGAIN when some other task holds
since APR_STATUS_IS_EAGAIN() in the caller can't reasonably check for
EACCES (since that would break other things), map EACCES to EAGAIN in

author: trawick
msg: tweak a message to mention an APR error value instead of an errno value
